text: The Hamilton Tiger-Cats are a Canadian Football League team in Hamilton, Ontario. They won 8 Grey Cups. They play at Tim Hortons Field in Hamilton, which opened in 2014 at the site of their former home of Ivor Wynne Stadium. The Tiger-Cats were founded in 1950 when the Hamilton Tigers, founded in 1869, merged with the Hamilton Wildcats, formed in 1941. == Other websites == * Official website Category:1950 establishments in Canada Category:Canadian football clubs Category:Sport in Hamilton
title: Hamilton Tiger-Cats
